markdownRemark.excerpt: Are you getting Buffer I/O error on device sr0 Change your grub boot options to add all_generic_ide=1
markdownRemark.html:
Are you getting

Buffer I/O error on device sr0

Change your grub boot options to add

all_generic_ide=1
